conbody.p: The dashboard report viewing is nearly the same as the viewing features used to view reports accessed through the Data Design menu. For details on viewing reports, see . When accessed, the Dashboard always displays the most recent run of the report.
Hover over the dashboard pod, you want to display the report chart, the toggle menu pops up. Choose the middle button to toggle the grid off and maximize the chart.

conbody.p: Choose the bottom button to toggle the chart off and maximize the grid.
